website_summaries.verdict: A 2-piece floating cooler with an inflatable base and a cooler insert that can also be used off the water.
pros: Cooler lifts from the base and can be used off the water
Can take the abuse of whitewater
Cooler stays in place inside the inner tube base
Keeps drinks cold all day long
cons: The holes for the cup holders sit low and have a tendency to fill with water and puts a drag on the cooler

website_summaries.verdict: A durable, high-quality option in floating bars that is versatile enough to be used in pools or boatside.
pros: Users appreciate that this has a very sturdy and effective design
Stands out for being large enough to handle many drinks without being bulky
It also gets top marks for its interior cooler that keeps drinks cold
Some customers comment that it holds up to years of use
We love that its optional tether allows for more uses
cons: Most felt the main drawback of this is that it's more functional than stylish

customer_reviews.title: You will NOT regret it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my moms pool for her retirement gift. This thing is awesome. Maybe an eye sore but who cares. First off the bag is huge fots a full 1.5 litter of wine in there and more. You can remove the bag and take with you somewhere else. The drink holders are awesome and the cooler is lined perfectly and keeps things very cold. Don't go with any other floating cooler this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: The BEST floating cooler out there!
customer_reviews.text: We first saw this floating cooler at our friends house in CA. We stocked it with drinks & ice and the ice was in there when we got out hours later. I now have my own pool so we tried using the Intex one we got for flowing the river and unfortunately, the space for drinks/ice does not close so the ice melted within an hour (80 deg weather). That night, I ordered this one. I love the fact that the cooler zips closed. I also love that you don't have to use the cooler part at all. Just today I used the base only to hold my phone some snacks and a drink I had. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Young

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright... we lost a few drinks and that’s why I only gave it 3 stars. The problem is water sneaks into the cup holders.. when it does it weighs it down and drinks fall out into the lake when tubing. You have to check often to dump excess water out. It did fit lunchables and some drinks in the center cooler which was helpful. I will use it again just because of what I paid for it but I don’t think it’s worth that price. It served its purpose. It was just okay 👌
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez Familia

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: I know that this cooler is somewhat of an eye sore... But it worked perfectly! I bought it specifically for days at the lake or the beach, where I knew it would probably get filthy on the outside anyway, so I wasn't concerned with the appearance. It kept our drinks cold all day long! We let it float with us in the water for some time and it stayed perfectly afloat. I definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: rdelgado

customer_reviews.title: Lake necessity
customer_reviews.text: I live at a campground with a recreational lake in FL. I loved meeting up with friends, tying up our floats together and hanging out but one of us had to keep paddling to shore to get our drinks. This floating cooler is very sturdy AND the cooler actually is well-insulated! I really like that I can remove the cooler from the float unlike most of the others I have seen. Excellent choice even though the colors are bold. Hey, it makes me easy to spot on the lake:)
customer_reviews.author: David R Fleig

customer_reviews.title: Holds ice ALL day
customer_reviews.text: I've used this several times now for pool parties and it has held the ice all day keeping drinks cold. Nice feature to have all of the cupholders numbered so you know which drink is yours. Very sturdy and never tips over even with all of the splashing and jumping around. Cupholders have fit all types of cans and bottles of water.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold!
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for a long tubing down the river trip, after reading reviews for the intex river run cooler and this one i decided this one was worth the extra cost because all the reviews said it actually held ice and kept things cold. The reviews were correct! and by the end all the other coolers in our group were full of warm drinks and my cooler was still icy cold after 6 hours. It's ugly but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Freaking Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I go out on the lake a lot. I looked and read a lot of reviews on other floats like this. I'm SO happy i picked this one. The ice chest in the middle holds ice for a good amount of time and thw cup holders are deep so you don't have to worry about a big cup not fitting. Some people may not like the color but i don't mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ortega's

customer_reviews.title: Stable and Keeps Water Out
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few different types of floating coolers. this one is buy far the best. I thought it might be a little bigger, but that wasn't' an issue. Stayed a float an kept ice for a few hours on a 90 degree day. Perfect to not have to get on the boat often for a round.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Edge

customer_reviews.title: floats and drinks are cold
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it's durable, works as expected, very happy. We have a Rotteweiler that likes to investigate drinks on side of pool, so a lot get spilled. This way we keep our drinks near us and away from our alcoholic dog.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mcateer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pool Cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect floating pool cooler! The cooler portion itself is actually not inflatable and can detach from the tube portion for easy cooler packing! The tube portion is very durable and stays completely afloat even when the cooler is fully stocked with 24 beers and ice! Other floating cooler he have had in the past would fill up with pool water right away. This one does not at all! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my floating cooler. Used it numerous times this summer in the pool. With a little ice, kept everything nice and chill. LOVE all the compartments for every ones favorite beverage too. Super duper is the name!!!
customer_reviews.author: Francis J. Pirozzi

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This thing will take a beating and keep on ticking! Stayed out in weather all year and again this summer, amazing the durability this little cooler float has. Drinks stay cool enough while in swimming pool, usually 3 or more hours.
customer_reviews.author: Gigib78

customer_reviews.title: Envy of everyone at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Every single time I got to the beach I am asked, "wow, where did you get that?" It works great. I love the quick release for deflating, and the checked valve for inflating. It can easily keep the cooler above water, and the cooler has no problem keeping the contents, well... cool. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KPeiffer

customer_reviews.title: Solid float/cooler
customer_reviews.text: This float/cooler is pretty sweat! I have no issues with it. Holds a ton of beer and water along with ice. Yes the ice will melt overtime but for my pool use it’s perfect. Ice probably lasted 3 hours. Just for giggles I wanted to see if it would hold a box of wine. It does and still room for ice!
customer_reviews.author: Fisette

customer_reviews.title: Best floating cooler
customer_reviews.text: I like how it's 2 pcs I leave the float out by the pool and the cooler in the house. Just fill the cooler and carry it out to the pool then drop it in the float. The ice stays all day. It holds a ton of cans but can also hold bottles of wine vertical. And it's insulated. You can't go wrong. Update August 2, 2019 - this cooler is still working great. Nothing has broken on it and there are no tears in the cooler which surprises me. And the float is still holding air with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Buck_Hunter 107

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product! It was much smaller than I expected. The cooler is a soft side cooler - I thought it was a hard shell, although I might have overlooked that in the description. The tube does not come with a quick connect tether or even rope to attach to another tube. The biggest problem, though, is that it really didn’t keep ice solid or drinks cold for a very long period of time. I definitely would not recommend this product for anyone going tubing on the river.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R.

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Great design! Attaches to our boat with a rope, very sturdy and well built. Love the cooler, it sits in the middle & keeps your drinks very cold. Nice for a day hanging of out at the lake with a group of friends. This cooler stays stable even with a wake coming from other boats. Plenty of room to hold your drinks while swimming, or just hanging out in the water on floats. So happy with this purchase! You can use the cooler out of the water also, it detaches & has a sturdy cord for carrying. This was just what we were looking for in a floating cooler!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I bought for my Boat/Pool.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler holds a full 24 pack of beer and a bag of Ice. Handy at the lake since it floats. Keeps us from having to get out of the water a lot. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Angie D.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Pool Drink Float
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pool float for our drinks that I had bought. Ice didn’t melt as bad as other floats. I love that the middle cooler comes out and you can so use it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We have a few blow up coolers for when we are on the boat hanging in the bay. All the other ones we have melt ice very fast. This one does a much better job keeping things cool
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schleier

customer_reviews.title: Ultra fun for the water!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Floating cooler, drink holder! It holds ice for a long time! We use this a lot while floating in the lake! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: plweekley

customer_reviews.title: Worked surprisingly well.
customer_reviews.text: Kept my beverage cold when in the container and a convenience beverage holders when opened. I anchored the inflatable out on the lake, in the sun for the better part of the week and have not noticed any signs of deterioration of questionable durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Tubing, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 would buy again. Cooler is great and holds a lot of beer, while the flotation device easily ties (with separate rope) to your inner tube! Great price, as most other similar models are waaaaay expensive.
customer_reviews.author: FNhp4421

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for boating
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for boating! It's nice to anchor and swim and not have to get out of the water for a beverage. There was even room for our portable speaker and phone so we could control music from the water. It was small enough to blow up without a pump and not take up too much room on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Had one for years, fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: My cooler gave out 2 years ago, but the float has endured for over 10 Years, if that's not a true testament of durability for a float, and most of the time it stays in the pool all winter. 10 star rating, cooler needs more care, but lasts long also.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Bowser

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC & A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what all the other 5 star reviews say and more! We got this for a trip down the Little Tenn. river, days at the pool and boat/beach trips. It was perfect for a river trip- we have no problems at all! We tied it to one of our tubes and just floated along. It had no problem going over and down the small rapids. In the pool - PERFECT! Beach- PERFECT! BOAT- PERFECT! The raft was easy to blow up and the cooler fits right in the middle. The cooler stayed in place and never popped out. You can easily fit 24 cans and ice inside, bottles about probably 12-18. IT'S A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: Love this for the pool
customer_reviews.text: This is the best floating cooler I have found for the pool. It's a nice large size and love that the pockets for the beverages have #'s on them so you know what beverage is yours. The tote in the middle is removable so you can fill it up inside the house and then bring it down to the pool. Or you can even use the middle part separately. It's a nice large size cooler as well and can fit a 12pack of bottles with ice no problem.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Cooler
customer_reviews.text: As a novelty item for a pool party this thing is neat but as an ACTUAL cooler this thing fails miserably. I first filled up the cooler with drinks and ice and left it in an air-conditioned hotel room and the ice melted almost immediately. Within 2 hours, it melted to almost all water. I took it to a pool party and used it anyway but had to frequently put ice in it and water would seep out through the plastic constantly. I won't ever buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: J-fer

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, I like the cooler, I like the toughness of it, I like the way it looks, BUT.... It has already faded badly after using it for half of the summer. Now it doesnt look so cool :(
customer_reviews.author: Scott White

customer_reviews.title: Never leaving the pool again!
customer_reviews.text: This was as great a success at the big annual pool party as I hoped it would be! We filled this bad boy up with about 18-20 beers and more ice than needed, and just let it float, visiting drunk people and offering frosty cold libations on it's merry way around the pool. The float portion of it even withstood two 12 year olds thinking it was a float for them and jumping off the side of the pool onto it before we beat them away and made them refill the cooler part with beer. If you have any reservations about this item, you may put them to rest. Just order it, I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit at our pool party. The removable cooler didn't even make it outside. Our guests filled the center portion of the floating base with ice and put the cans right in the ice. They also used the cup holders. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cooler was much bigger than I thought and does a good job keeping things cold. Raft floated good and worked well. Seemed sturdy enough. I used it all the time! Unfortunately I let someone borrow it and the base floated away on them (lost down the river) Trying to just buy the raft part but can't seem to get a good answer or find a way to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Graf

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our Aqua Oasis!
customer_reviews.text: Buy TWO! One for the car and one for the pool! Best darn floating drink barge ever. The cooler on top will keep your drinks cold all day. And what's cool about the barge is that everyone in the family has a number and that's where you store YOUR drink. My number if FIVE, put your drink in my hole and its fair game! But everyone loves it! It's a so cool. We load up the cooler before heading out to the pool. There's a little rectangular area for keys or our 'water proof playing cards'. It was the best 'toy' investment we made for our pool!
customer_reviews.author: SocialButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler for the few hours you need it to be a good cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I can't remember how many years ago I bought this. It does what it says it does. It won't keep your beer cold for days, but a few hours floating down a river, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: This thing is perfect
customer_reviews.text: It reminds me of Dr. Seuss and McDonalds but it floats down rivers and keeps your cans cold. The cupholders around it are perfect for empties as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Yes. It’s loud, but the best floating cooler you’ll find.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the most attractive cooler, but out on the lake or in the river, it does it’s job. Keeps beverages cool and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: For people who like float on the water with cold drinks this is the cooler for you. Holds a lot and keeps beverages cold. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rollin

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Excelent way to keep your cold drinks near you on a pool, beach or river.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Berges

customer_reviews.title: This thing loves Busch Lights
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. I tie it to the back of our boat when at the sand bar. This can hold a good amount of brews, especially if it's Busch Light. The numbers are great. The random slot between 1 and 6 is perfect for a waterproof camera or whatever else you'd like there. It's also rugged which is great after a few drinks. I wouldn't hesitant to take this down the Sugar River in Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: I_FearNoEvil

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for tubing rivers and it is amazing. I often get asked where did I buy it. I pack it with drinks and ice and float for three hours. It hold ice for the entire trip and is very balanced and never turned over this past year. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deb R

customer_reviews.title: Cold Cold Cold!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks! From the pool to river floats in 100+ degrees this cooler keeps the drinks cold. Very durable, we tie it off to our tubes while floating the river & it has held up great even with a couple of crashes along the way. Very nice in the pool too! I have left it floating in the pool over night in AZ & there is still ice in it the next day. Holds 24 cans & 12-15 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: best I've used yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Went tubing with friends and they all had different tubes. Some of the river was rough and I'm the only one who didn't lose their beer! Keeps beverages colder than most others on the market. Zips shut. Cooler part can be taken out and carried for easier transport. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: lori mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one as we misplaced the first one. Perfect for floating anywhere! I've had this on the beach, on the river and in the pool. Plenty large to fit drinks and snacks for our group of 4. Floats great no matter how full/heavy you pack it. Made of heavy plastic so no worries about leaks when it gets dragged to the gravel bar. We use the cooler alone as well. Soft sides make it easy to pack, it basically can collapse to the size of whatever is inside. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've put this through some abuse, and when it is full it is pretty solid. if you are floating the river and it gets empty, do yourself a favor and fill the cooler up with riverwater, this ballast will keep the two pieces together better than if the cooler is light (it expands the bottom of the cooler and it 'grips' the float). Holds a good amount of cans and ice, should get you at least a few miles down the river... I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: I like that you can remove the cooler easily. It fits snugly in its place.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good buy for the money. It keeps things cold. It works great in our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Payne

customer_reviews.title: Drink Saver
customer_reviews.text: Husband absolutely loves it. We have a Boston Terrier that loves to dive in the pool to fetch a ball. Many times he has knocked a cup over running around the pool. With this, no drink spills. Should have bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: SSM

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST floating cooler out there. Don't waste your money on those "inflatable" coolers...they aren't insulated and they won't keep your ice or drinks cold. This has the extra compartment dr sunscreen and other items. Best purchase I've made in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Tanasi

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: use it for tubing, does the job, easy to use, easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: campergirl

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy or spacious
customer_reviews.text: With ice it would hold a 12 pack at best.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Seda

customer_reviews.title: Just had to have this....
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the Intex Pacific Paradise Lounge, I just had to get this too! So nice to have all your cool beverages and goodies at your fingertips. Works great...we pile ice over our drinks and meltables in the separate cooler, then set it adrift tied to our lounge! LOTS OF ROOM IN THE COOLER! Very stable..you could keep valuables in it if you chose to not use it as cooler. You will need a thin piece of twine, string, or a fish stringer to tie it to your float though. PARTY ON!
customer_reviews.author: Boppity Boppity TZU

customer_reviews.title: Like I gave birth to it
customer_reviews.text: Last year we were boat virgins, having just purchased a small Ranger. Much of our boating time consists of running around a bit and then settling in a cove somewhere with some cold beer, etc. This item is very stable, and sits nicely in the water with plenty of places to stores drinks all around. It keeps things nice and cool and solves the problem of having to get in and out of the boat. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Rachael E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use this once since I got it at the end of the pool season. It works great. The cup holder were good for both cans and bottles. I can’t wait to use it all season next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Cheercoach

customer_reviews.title: Floats and keeps cold!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I filled up the cooler with about 18 cans of beer plus ice, I thought there was NO WAY the little “donut” was going to keep the now heavy cooler afloat. Boy was I wrong! This thing floats like a champ! Surpassed all expectations, the insulated liner keeps your drinks nice and cold, and the whole thing is built sturdy enough to take a beating floating down the river.
customer_reviews.author: Seahawk

customer_reviews.title: Great for tubing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect float for tubing, is durable and stayed upright even when the water got a little choppy!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for drinking and floating!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these and put it, deflated, in our suitcase, for our trip to the BVI. We used it every afternoon when we floated off the back of our boat with our crew of friends. It was PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Robin H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this floating cooler. Easy to manage in and out of the water. Arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fourth of July pool gathering It worked Great..
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the pool yesterday ....fourth of July pool gathering It worked Great.......at night I went to empty it n it still had ice......the bag is well insulated! I did zip up the bag every time after we retrieved the beverages We placed beer bottles, juice bottles n water battles in it A total of 6 or 7!
customer_reviews.author: OSWALDO TAPANES

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for standing in the water on a hot day
customer_reviews.text: Used this almost all of Aug. We put it out with a sand anchor and just let it float around us while we all stood in about wast high water. Held ice for a good few hours, and more than enough drinks. When drinks ran low, just replaced from the big cooler. Floats really well, as we were on a busy part of the river with big waves. Everything stayed dry including cigarettes that we kept in the big pocket. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick E.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the kayaking
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son whom kayaks. floats much easier then a cooler. he also used it for floating in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for floating the river!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler survived the Guadalupe and was perfect to hold drinks and food for three for a 4 hour float! We had people asking where we bought it all up and down the river. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: travelingfam

customer_reviews.title: Ugly, but it floats and works!!!
customer_reviews.text: The group laughed at me when I blew it up, continued to make fun of the bright Airhead, yet was impressed on it's floating abilities as we went down the river. Even with the cooler full of weight from ice, bottles, and cans, it floated right along with us. You need a SMALL carabiner or rope to tie off because the one place on the side of the tube doesn't accommodate the medium carabiner's. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: canafake

customer_reviews.title: Best Aqua Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Best and Ugliest Aqua Cooler....holds lots and keep cold all day
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Cooler slouched
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cooler had sturdier sides. The first time we use it, it filled with water and collapsed on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Renate  Diedirck

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sucks as it nose dive
customer_reviews.text: Bought for taking on Kayak excursions, Kinda sucks as it nose dive, like a lot........
customer_reviews.author: Jomamma

customer_reviews.title: Best.cooler.ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cooler. It holds so much and is easy to carry with the strap. It's my go to for floating on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: NWood

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stuff pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it separates from tube it makes it way easier to transport
customer_reviews.author: punky

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: great cooler, used it all summer in the pool. The cooler can has a long handle and can be used if going to park, beach, game , etc..
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: Great for river floats!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we go on two riverfloats in northern WI every year. It worked great, was easy to carry, and kept things cold during our 8 hour float. My only complaints were the coloring- I wish it was a more neutral color instead of bright red/yellow AND the slot to tie up the cooler was very small, we had to tie it on using the carrying strap. Otherwise it was a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Happymom

customer_reviews.title: Fun !
customer_reviews.text: We don't have a swim-up bar at our house, but we do have a pool. With our Airhead, we now have a "Redneck Swim-up Bar"! Holds tons of drinks, great holder for cans or bottles, and is made of really durable material. Great that the cooler is its own unit and can be lifted out and cleaned easily. Color is a bit brash, but you won't lose sight of it!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Silver

customer_reviews.title: Great place to set drinks while floating
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Guests had a place to set their drinks while floating in the lake at our dock parties. Heavy duty to float with lots of drinks in the slots.
customer_reviews.author: NextChapter

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging out in the water and enjoying...beverages.
customer_reviews.text: I take this guy to my family's cabin and tie it to my raft while floating around in the lake. It's super convenient and holds a fair amount of cans/bottles for a few hours of drifting and floating. The cup holders are great for cans and beer bottles, while the bigger compartment will hold a reusable water bottle pretty well. It's a good'en.
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: the idea is good!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that when filled with air the cup holders also shrink so a normal solo cup will only fit with great effort in the cup holders! (the cups will bend and you have your drink in the pool) You will have to use glasses and of course glass in the pool is not a very wise idea.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy22

customer_reviews.title: perfect floating cooler for the pool or lake
customer_reviews.text: This was for our silent auction at work, it was a HUGE hit! I wish I would have gotten one for myself too! perfect floating cooler for the pool or lake! With 6 cup holders and a place to put something else!
customer_reviews.author: Calli R

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool but!
customer_reviews.text: The Ice chest does not keep ice very long in the heat. I live in Texas and over the weekend used this thing and it kept the beer cold for maybe two to three hours then it was all melted and got warm. Not good if you live where its hot try something else. The drink holder is pretty cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome floating cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend for her Birthday who just got a bigger pool this summer. I knew she would love it. It's a great idea and very convenient to have floating with you all day. The middle compartment is big enough for a 12 pack of your favorite beverage and alot of ice to keep it nice and cool. Would definitely recommend this for everyone that has a pool!
customer_reviews.author: T. Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: a n excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gifts I ever got for my husband. We fill it with drinks to float in the pool, we take it on the boat, it goes in the car as just a cooler for trips. It can't go in the freezer though - I tore the inside all to heck so I've just ordered another one because DH likes it so well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shrewsbury

customer_reviews.title: Cooler is soft sided but that helps with storage, ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooler is soft sided but that helps with storage, it crunches down relatively small. It keeps ice okay, not spectacular. I re-freezable ice packs instead of cubes.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to carry and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Buy it.. Bought to take on the river. It's easy to carry and it works great. Holds a lot of drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used the cooler on a bib kayak trip on Lake Superior, not really suitable for float. But looking forward to using float/cooler on a lazy river trip.
customer_reviews.author: Annette C

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So, the float is cheap rubber, not what you would expect from Airhead. The cooler is the nylon material you'd expect, but they really cheaped out on the base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Yes - this is exactly what we wanted! The cooler is removable. We only use the cooler sometimes. Most of the time we use just the drink caddy, and tie it up to your pool float so it follows you. It is sturdy and will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous floatie cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cooler for 2-3 years now, when it comes out - summer fun is HERE!!! We pack it full and it keeps drinks cold in the pool, it doesn't overturn...ever!! We used it last summer on the Lake of the Ozarks for a week, tied a rope through the hole and it kept all our beverages cold and even with the waves from boats/jet skis it never overturned and with 19 adults in the water it was FULL!! The pocket is great for extra koozies, suntan lotion and whatever else. Having the cooler detach from the base makes it super easy to travel with. Buy one, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: wayred48

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Took this on vacation, for a group party. Worked well as a secondary pool bar
customer_reviews.author: BearTrap

customer_reviews.title: Aqua Oasis cooler
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS COOLER!! It went from the box to the river and performed excellent. The quality and construction are great. I was receiving compliments all day. FYI, the detachable cooler, which is an awesome feature, floats as well, but thats a different story. The base is easy to inflate and does not require a pump. The only minor issue I have is that the cooler does not fit 24 cans plus ice. However, 18 cans with ice is no problem, and for a 6 hrs on the water, thats plenty.
customer_reviews.author: litlmat

customer_reviews.title: The BEST floating cooler
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best floating cooler. This is a staple in our must haves for our annual trip to Aruba! We sacrifice clothes in the name of the cooler... priorities! An absolute must have, buy it, you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Marathon swimmers, take notice!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this item as a floating feed station for long distance open water swim workouts, and it is awesome! The cup holders are the perfect size for our feed cups (we use a variety of blender bottles) so mostly put the empties there for safekeeping, or the current bottle being consumed if not fully emptied on the first pass. The center cooler keeps them from getting warm (and spoiled, over the longer sessions on hot days).
customer_reviews.author: CaptainVMD

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and very convienent!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this floating cooler to take on a 5-7 hour lazy river tubing trip with some friends. This cooler did everything the description said and i was very happy with my purchase! I fit so much ice, snacks, and drinks in the cooler, I was worried the base wouldn't keep it afloat! But there was no problems with that, and it kept everything cool for the entire trip! The best part is that you can take the cooler off the inflable ring. It makes packing the cooler, as well as transportation so much easier! I would definately recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: kellyjean1103

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing...
customer_reviews.text: However we used it 3 differnt vacations. by the 3rd vacation it has a hole. I don't know if that is just normal or the product is thinner than what I thought. But it comes in very handy when on the lake. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Pool/Lake fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for anyone with a pool or a boat. We use this when we "beach" or boat and it does a great job of keeping drinks cool and holding drinks in place. Too bad there's no "airhead blender."
customer_reviews.author: D. Sturchio

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just took this cooler on a camping trip with a lazy river. We have tried other coolers like the bobber cooler, that one filled with water everytime we tried to get a drink out. We filled this cooler and all the cup holders, it never sank. I think we payed abot $24 for it and it was worth it!This cooler was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the pool or short float trips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on short float trips, as we float on individual raft and innertubes. Simply tied it onto my tube with a short rope so it stayed connected to me while floating down the river. Works pretty decent. Doesn't hold ice real great, but then it's not really advertised as an "extreme" cooler, so cannot ding it for that. For the short 1-2 hr floats or relaxing in the pool, it holds ice well enough to keep everything cold and food chilled. Very fun little floating cooler that blows up quickly, and when done with it, you can simply deflate the floating ring and pack it inside the cooler bag!
customer_reviews.author: Sir Camps-A-Lot

customer_reviews.title: Cold beer and pop close at hand.
customer_reviews.text: My adult children and their friends love to river raft. This holds their beverages and tethers behind them perfectly. The center cooler comes out for easy filling and clips in for the rapids.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lorentson

customer_reviews.title: Got a lot of WoWs from family & friends.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and love it. We use on the lake when we go boating. Everyone love it and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: ... down the river with a full load and worked great
customer_reviews.text: went down the river with a full load and worked great
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sellers

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this cooler
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cooler for a river tubing trip we go on. The river has a couple spots of mild rapids and the cooler never even came close to tipping and kept our beverages nice and cold for the full 4 hour tube ride.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: It is thick and feels like it can hold its own on a rocky river
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of the rubber used for the inflatable cup holders. It is thick and feels like it can hold its own on a rocky river. Since I use it in a pool, I'll never know, but it is much better quality than most pool floats out there.
customer_reviews.author: Will L.

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: really great cool bag and float and does the job I needed it to do. The back is also useful for taking on trips to keep the beers cool :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great, it keeps your drinks cool since it is insulated and plenty of cupholders for your guests to keep you from having to go in and out of the pool and limiting spilled drinks. It also has a slot for sunblock of what nots.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinda05

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Lightweight, Reliable....love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this as it can be used in the water or as a small portable cooler for other events. We took it on our beach vacation and use it around town, as well. great concept!
customer_reviews.author: L Taber

product_meta.title: Airhead Parent Title
feature_bullets: You don't have to interrupt the party to restock the cooler with airhead's aqua oasis
The insulated leak-proof nylon cooler lifts up from the inflatable vinyl base
It keeps 24 cans ice cold for hours and the 6 drink holders in the floating base are marked with numbers
The sundry holder is a convenient place to store suntan lotion
A molded plastic rope connector is welded to the side for tethering to an airhead lounge

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
